channel.title: Expire on CLOUD DATACENTER & DEVICE MANAGEMENT BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Expire on CLOUD DATACENTER & DEVICE MANAGEMENT BLOG

item.title: This Build of Windows will expire soon – (Windows Server Technical Preview)
item.description: UPDATE : Hotfix is now available and for more details please have a look at my blog http://nirmalt.com/2015/04/14/continue-to-use-windows-server-technical-preview-1-oct-2014 If you are running Windows Server Preview (Technical Preview 1 Released in 1stOct 2014), you might have already realized that it’s set to expire on 15thApril. While Microsoft is preparing to release Technical Preview 2 sometime in May, we will need to look for an alternative to continue using Windows Server Preview build.
